refnamediv.refpurpose: Removes duplicate records from any Palm database.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: pilot-dedupe is used to remove duplicate records from any Palm database.

listitem.para: Use device file <port> to communicate with the Palm handheld. If this is not specified, pilot-dedupe will look for the $PILOTPORT environment variable. If neither are found or supplied, pilot-dedupe will print the usage information.
Display version of pilot-dedupe and exit without connecting.
Display the help synopsis for pilot-dedupe and exit without connecting.
Display a brief usage message and exit without connecting.

refsect1.title: Example
refsect1.para: To remove duplicates from the Address and Todo databases:
